text:
HS THEME BUG: When Cloning a theme.

Just a quick heads up on a repeatable bug that I've noticed when cloning a theme.  The various URL paths don't seem to be "connecting" correctly even though the path is right.  For example, below...

`{% extends "./layouts/base.html" %}`

This is the correct path, however the system throws a warning.  As a result in the CMS, many of the features (drag-n-drop) don't work.  To correct this I had to go in and make a subtle change the to the file then PUBLISH, revert that change, and PUBLISH again.

Then the warning disappeared and the Theme worked as normal in the CMS.

Let me know if you need more details.
Thanks <@UA5DFM7CK> for a solution, i have had this problem as well a while back but was not able to solve it!
Can you send me a link to the template?
Actually I should be able to reproduce on my end :eyes:
Pardon the late reply <@U6GNQ7JBU>.  Let me know if I can provide you with anything.
